summary: I PURCHASED SIX NEXEN TIRES OVER A YEAR AGO FOR MY JAYHAWK CAMPER. THREE WEEKS AGO I TOOK A TRIP TO ASHVILLE NC AND DURING THE TRIP TWO OF THE BACK TIRES --ONE ON EACH SIDE OF THE RV DEVELOPED RIDGES DOWN THE CENTER OF THE TIRE AND CAME APART. I TOOK THE TIRES BACK TO WHERE THEY WERE PURCHASED AND WAS TOLD THEY WOULD ONLY GIVE ME $75 FOR ONE OF THE TIRES BECAUSE ONE HAD BEEN DRIVEN WHILE FLAT. I ASKED THAT THEY ALL BE REPLACE AS THEY COULD BE DEFECTIVE AND WAS TOLD NO.   *TR
